title: Limit Notifications and Messages
task: Asks ALFRED to show light meal suggestions for the day
summary: As an older person, I want to block almost all ALFRED notifications and messages, so I do not feel disturbed or overwhelmed.

title: Show Only Beverage Meal Options
task: Reviews simple beverage-based meal options from ALFRED
summary: As an older person I want to see only beverage options so that I avoid complex food advice and feel less overwhelmed.

title: Dismiss Challenging Exercises
task: Declines gentle exercise prompts offered by ALFRED
summary: As an older person I want to dismiss all challenging exercises immediately so that I avoid feeling pressured, overwhelmed, or unsafe.

title: Confirm Beverage Intake
task: Confirms to ALFRED that she has drunk her herbal tea
summary: As an older person I want to tell ALFRED only when I drink my herbal tea so that I keep control and avoid unwanted messages.

title: Formal communication for all contacts
task: Avoids engaging in activities she finds unnecessary or challenging
summary: As an older person I want all ALFRED conversations to be formal, polite, and ethical so that I feel safe and respected.

title: Push-to-Talk Activation
task: Presses the push-to-talk button to start interaction with ALFRED
summary: As an older person, I want to start ALFRED only by pressing push-to-talk, so I control when it listens and avoid feeling unsafe.

title: Control App Installations
task: Asks ALFRED about her daily schedule
summary: As an older person I want to block all app installations unless I ask, so that I keep my privacy safe and avoid unwanted changes.

title: Request Simple Weather Information
task: Requests simple information like the weather
summary: As an older person I want to ask ALFRED for very simple weather updates without extra details or explanations so that I can understand it easily and quickly.

title: Formal Communication Only
task: Asks ALFRED to remind her to drink herbal tea
summary: As an older person, I want all messages and calls from ALFRED to be formal, polite, and respectful, so I feel comfortable and safe.

title: Stay Offline During Group Calls
task: Chooses to stay offline during group video calls
summary: As an older person I want to avoid group video calls to not feel pressured to join social activities.

title: On-demand vital sign reporting
task: Requests ALFRED to report her vital signs on demand
summary: As an older adult, I want full control over sharing my vital signs only with official medical staff.

title: Control data sharing strictly
task: Requests ALFRED to remind her only when she asks
summary: As an older person, I want to limit health data sharing with caregivers to only necessary information, so that my privacy is protected.

title: User-Controlled Medication Reminders
task: Use voice commands to request medication reminders from ALFRED
summary: As an older person, I want to get medication reminders only when I ask, so I keep full control and avoid unwanted alerts.

title: Control ALFRED’s message tone
task: Control when to hear reminders by pressing push-to-talk button
summary: As an older person I want all ALFRED messages to be formal, polite, and respectful so that I feel safe and comfortable.

title: Avoid Detailed Feature Explanations
task: Dismiss detailed explanations about system features
summary: As an experienced older adult, I want ALFRED to avoid detailed explanations and provide only necessary information, so I can use it quickly.

title: Control ALFRED's voice activation
task: Request ALFRED to keep explanations simple and avoid interruptions
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to listen only when I press a button, so I avoid surprise or unwanted answers.

title: Arrange Nurse Check-Ins Offline
task: Choose to arrange nurse check-ins offline rather than via video calls
summary: As an older person, I want nurse check-ins only when I arrange them at home, so I feel safe and in control.

title: Limit ALFRED’s spontaneous suggestions
task: Limit engagement with ALFRED to essential functions only
summary: As an older person I want ALFRED to not send almost any social or exercise suggestions so I do not feel pressured or overwhelmed.

title: Control Formal Communication Style
task: Maintain controlled communication and avoid spontaneous interactions
summary: As an older person, I want all communication with my nurse to be formal and polite, so I always feel respected and safe.
